entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Local blowing snow early this morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Thursday 20 April 2023
